column4: Let me link you to some of the threads where my problems in Ubuntu can be seen and read about
i used to use timidity, you can compile it
Were you able to find any solution for the many threads I posted here?

i don't. it works for me.
do you know what kind of FTP server it is?

that's so. odd. i have no idea.
